name: Andreas Malas
story: Giorgos Tavoularis grew up in the city of Athens and joined the Greek Army at a young age. He quickly rose through the ranks due to his exceptional leadership skills and became a sergeant in the special forces. After several successful missions, he was recruited by the OPFOR faction in the ongoing conflict in Altis. As a team leader, Giorgos is responsible for ensuring the success of his squad's missions, even if it means making tough decisions.
